inlineContent.text: A Generators typically creates values using a
is not shared between multiple generators, then they are said to be independent e.g. One generator does not affect the randomness of any other generators.

The generator protocol has no requirement to be random nor is there any requirement to be stateless. The generator might generate random elements or follow some predetermined pattern. Therefore, sharing a generator between unrelated contexts should be done with care.
